title: Foul Matter
description: The bestselling author of the Richard Jury novels delivers a razor-sharp and raucously funny send-up of the cutthroat world of publishing. And the praise is pouring "A hilarious and wicked caper-adventure on the evils of the book business."— Pittsburgh Post-Gazette "Does laughing uncontrollably on a subway train constitute legitimate literary criticism? If it does, then Foul Matter ...gets a great review from me." — New York Times Book Review "She can kick literary butt—in more ways than one." — USA Today
author: Martha Grimes
